00045 /*
00046  *      q p O A S E S m e x _ c o n s t r a i n t s
00047  */
00048 void qpOASESmex_constraints(    int nV, int nC, int nP,
00049                                                                 SymmetricMatrix *H, real_t* g, Matrix *A,
00050                                                                 real_t* lb, real_t* ub, real_t* lbA, real_t* ubA,
00051                                                                 int nWSRin, real_t* x0, Options* options,
00052                                                                 int nOutputs, mxArray* plhs[]
00053                                                                 )
00054 {
00055         /* 1) Setup initial QP. */
00056         QProblem QP( nV,nC );
00057         QP.setOptions( *options );
00058 
00059         /* 2) Solve initial QP. */
00060         returnValue returnvalue;
00061 
00062         if ( x0 == 0 )
00063                 returnvalue = QP.init( H,g,A,lb,ub,lbA,ubA, nWSRin,0 );
00064         else
00065                 returnvalue = QP.init( H,g,A,lb,ub,lbA,ubA, nWSRin,0, x0,0,0,0 );
00066 
00067         /* 3) Solve remaining QPs and assign lhs arguments. */
00068         /*    Set up pointers to the current QP vectors */
00069         real_t* g_current   = g;
00070         real_t* lb_current  = lb;
00071         real_t* ub_current  = ub;
00072         real_t* lbA_current = lbA;
00073         real_t* ubA_current = ubA;
00074 
00075         /* Loop through QP sequence. */
00076         for ( int k=0; k<nP; ++k )
00077         {
00078                 if ( k != 0 )
00079                 {
00080                         /* update pointers to the current QP vectors */
00081                         g_current = &(g[k*nV]);
00082                         if ( lb != 0 )
00083                                 lb_current = &(lb[k*nV]);
00084                         if ( ub != 0 )
00085                                 ub_current = &(ub[k*nV]);
00086                         if ( lbA != 0 )
00087                                 lbA_current = &(lbA[k*nC]);
00088                         if ( ubA != 0 )
00089                                 ubA_current = &(ubA[k*nC]);
00090 
00091                         returnvalue = QP.hotstart( g_current,lb_current,ub_current,lbA_current,ubA_current, nWSRin,0 );
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 /* write results into output vectors */
00095                 obtainOutputs(  k,&QP,returnvalue,nWSRin,
00096                                                 nOutputs,plhs,nV,nC );
00097         }
00098 
00099         return;
00100 }

00103 /*
00104  *      q p O A S E S m e x _ b o u n d s
00105  */
00106 void qpOASESmex_bounds( int nV, int nP,
00107                                                 SymmetricMatrix *H, real_t* g,
00108                                                 real_t* lb, real_t* ub,
00109                                                 int nWSRin, real_t* x0, Options* options,
00110                                                 int nOutputs, mxArray* plhs[]
00111                                                 )
00112 {
00113         /* 1) Setup initial QP. */
00114         QProblemB QP( nV );
00115         QP.setOptions( *options );
00116 
00117         /* 2) Solve initial QP. */
00118         returnValue returnvalue;
00119 
00120         if ( x0 == 0 )
00121                 returnvalue = QP.init( H,g,lb,ub, nWSRin,0 );
00122         else
00123                 returnvalue = QP.init( H,g,lb,ub, nWSRin,0, x0,0,0 );
00124 
00125         /* 3) Solve remaining QPs and assign lhs arguments. */
00126         /*    Set up pointers to the current QP vectors */
00127         real_t* g_current  = g;
00128         real_t* lb_current = lb;
00129         real_t* ub_current = ub;
00130 
00131         /* Loop through QP sequence. */
00132         for ( int k=0; k<nP; ++k )
00133         {
00134                 if ( k != 0 )
00135                 {
00136                         /* update pointers to the current QP vectors */
00137                         g_current = &(g[k*nV]);
00138                         if ( lb != 0 )
00139                                 lb_current = &(lb[k*nV]);
00140                         if ( ub != 0 )
00141                                 ub_current = &(ub[k*nV]);
00142 
00143                         returnvalue = QP.hotstart( g_current,lb_current,ub_current, nWSRin,0 );
00144                 }
00145 
00146                 /* write results into output vectors */
00147                 obtainOutputs(  k,&QP,returnvalue,nWSRin,
00148                                                 nOutputs,plhs,nV );
00149         }
00150 
00151         return;
00152 }

00156 /*
00157  *      m e x F u n c t i o n
00158  */
00159 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[], int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[] )
00160 {
00161         /* inputs */
00162         SymmetricMatrix *H=0;
00163         Matrix *A=0;
00164         real_t *g=0, *A_for=0, *A_mem=0, *lb=0, *ub=0, *lbA=0, *ubA=0, *x0=0;
00165         int H_idx, g_idx, A_idx, lb_idx, ub_idx, lbA_idx, ubA_idx, x0_idx=-1, options_idx=-1;
00166 
00167         Options options;
00168         options.printLevel = PL_LOW;
00169         #ifdef __DEBUG__
00170         options.printLevel = PL_HIGH;
00171         #endif
00172         #ifdef __SUPPRESSANYOUTPUT__
00173         options.printLevel = PL_NONE;
00174         #endif
00175 
00176         /* dimensions */
00177         unsigned int nV=0, nC=0, nP=0;
00178 
00179         /* sparse matrix indices and values */
00180         sparse_int_t *Hdiag = 0, *Hir = 0, *Hjc = 0, *Air = 0, *Ajc = 0;
00181         real_t *Hv = 0, *Av = 0;
00182 
00183         /* I) CONSISTENCY CHECKS: */
00184         /* 1) Ensure that qpOASES is called with a feasible number of input arguments. */
00185         if ( ( nrhs < 4 ) || ( nrhs > 9 ) )
00186                 mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): Invalid number of input arguments!\n    Type 'help qpOASES' for further information." );
00187 
00188         /* 2) Check for proper number of output arguments. */
00189         if ( nlhs > 5 )
00190                 mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): At most five output arguments are allowed: \n    [obj,x,y,status,nWSRout]!" );
00191         if ( nlhs < 1 )
00192                 mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): At least one output argument is required: [obj,...]!" );
00193 
00194 
00195         /* II) PREPARE RESPECTIVE QPOASES FUNCTION CALL: */
00196         /*     Choose between QProblem and QProblemB object and assign the corresponding
00197          *     indices of the input pointer array in to order to access QP data correctly. */
00198         H_idx = 0;
00199         g_idx = 1;
00200         nV = mxGetM( prhs[ H_idx ] ); /* row number of Hessian matrix */
00201         nP = mxGetN( prhs[ g_idx ] ); /* number of columns of the gradient matrix (vectors series have to be stored columnwise!) */
00202 
00203         /* 0) Check whether options are specified .*/
00204         if ( ( !mxIsEmpty( prhs[nrhs-1] ) ) && ( mxIsStruct( prhs[nrhs-1] ) ) )
00205                 options_idx = nrhs-1;
00206 
00207         /* 1) Simply bounded QP. */
00208         if ( ( ( nrhs >= 4 ) && ( nrhs <= 5 ) ) ||
00209                  ( ( options_idx > 0 ) && ( nrhs == 6 ) ) )
00210         {
00211                 lb_idx   = 2;
00212                 ub_idx   = 3;
00213 
00214                 if ( nrhs >= 5 ) /* x0 specified */
00215                         x0_idx = 4;
00216                 else
00217                         x0_idx = -1;
00218         }
00219         else
00220         {
00221                 A_idx = 2;
00222 
00223                 /* If constraint matrix is empty, use a QProblemB object! */
00224                 if ( mxIsEmpty( prhs[ A_idx ] ) )
00225                 {
00226                         lb_idx   = 3;
00227                         ub_idx   = 4;
00228 
00229                         if ( nrhs >= 8 ) /* x0 specified */
00230                                 x0_idx = 7;
00231                         else
00232                                 x0_idx = -1;
00233                 }
00234                 else
00235                 {
00236                         lb_idx   = 3;
00237                         ub_idx   = 4;
00238                         lbA_idx  = 5;
00239                         ubA_idx  = 6;
00240 
00241                         if ( nrhs >= 8 ) /* x0 specified */
00242                                 x0_idx = 7;
00243                         else
00244                                 x0_idx = -1;
00245 
00246                         nC = mxGetM( prhs[ A_idx ] ); /* row number of constraint matrix */
00247                 }
00248         }
00249 
00250 
00251         /* III) ACTUALLY PERFORM QPOASES FUNCTION CALL: */
00252         int nWSRin = 5*(nV+nC);
00253         if ( options_idx > 0 )
00254                 setupOptions( &options,prhs[options_idx],nWSRin );
00255 
00256         /* ensure that data is given in real_t precision */
00257         if ( ( mxIsDouble( prhs[ H_idx ] ) == 0 ) ||
00258                  ( mxIsDouble( prhs[ g_idx ] ) == 0 ) )
00259                 mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): All data has to be provided in double precision!" );
00260 
00261         /* Check inputs dimensions and assign pointers to inputs. */
00262         if ( mxGetN( prhs[ H_idx ] ) != nV )
00263         {
00264                 char msg[200]; 
00265                 snprintf(msg, 199, "ERROR (qpOASES): Hessian matrix input dimension mismatch (%ld != %d)!", 
00266                                 (long int)mxGetN(prhs[H_idx]), nV);
00267                 fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", msg);
00268                 mexErrMsgTxt(msg);
00269         }
00270 
00271         /* check for sparsity */
00272         if ( mxIsSparse( prhs[ H_idx ] ) != 0 )
00273         {
00274                 mwIndex *oct_ir = mxGetIr(prhs[H_idx]);
00275                 mwIndex *oct_jc = mxGetJc(prhs[H_idx]);
00276                 double *v = (double*)mxGetPr(prhs[H_idx]);
00277                 long nfill = 0;
00278                 long i, j;
00279 
00280                 /* copy indices to avoid 64/32-bit integer confusion */
00281                 /* also add explicit zeros on diagonal for regularization strategy */
00282                 /* copy values, too */
00283                 Hir = new sparse_int_t[oct_jc[nV] + nV];
00284                 Hjc = new sparse_int_t[nV+1];
00285                 Hv = new real_t[oct_jc[nV] + nV];
00286                 for (j = 0; j < nV; j++) 
00287                 {
00288                         Hjc[j] = oct_jc[j] + nfill;
00289                         /* fill up to diagonal */
00290                         for (i = oct_jc[j]; i < oct_jc[j+1] && oct_ir[i] <= j; i++) 
00291                         {
00292                                 Hir[i + nfill] = oct_ir[i];
00293                                 Hv[i + nfill] = v[i];
00294                         }
00295                         /* possibly add zero diagonal element */
00296                         if (i >= oct_jc[j+1] || oct_ir[i] > j)
00297                         {
00298                                 Hir[i + nfill] = j;
00299                                 Hv[i + nfill] = 0.0;
00300                                 nfill++;
00301                         }
00302                         /* fill up to diagonal */
00303                         for (; i < oct_jc[j+1]; i++) 
00304                         {
00305                                 Hir[i + nfill] = oct_ir[i];
00306                                 Hv[i + nfill] = v[i];
00307                         }
00308                 }
00309                 Hjc[nV] = oct_jc[nV] + nfill;
00310 
00311                 SymSparseMat *sH;
00312                 H = sH = new SymSparseMat(nV, nV, Hir, Hjc, Hv);
00313                 Hdiag = sH->createDiagInfo();
00314         }
00315         else
00316         {
00317                 H = new SymDenseMat(nV, nV, nV, (real_t*) mxGetPr(prhs[H_idx]));
00318         }
00319 
00320         if ( smartDimensionCheck( &g,nV,nP, BT_FALSE,prhs,g_idx ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00321                 return;
00322 
00323         if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lb,nV,nP, BT_TRUE,prhs,lb_idx ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00324                 return;
00325 
00326         if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ub,nV,nP, BT_TRUE,prhs,ub_idx ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00327                 return;
00328 
00329         if ( smartDimensionCheck( &x0,nV,1, BT_TRUE,prhs,x0_idx ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00330                 return;
00331 
00332         if ( nC > 0 )
00333         {
00334                 /* ensure that data is given in real_t precision */
00335                 if ( mxIsDouble( prhs[ A_idx ] ) == 0 )
00336                         mexErrMsgTxt( "ERROR (qpOASES): All data has to be provided in real_t precision!" );
00337 
00338                 /* Check inputs dimensions and assign pointers to inputs. */
00339                 if ( mxGetN( prhs[ A_idx ] ) != nV )
00340                 {
00341                         char msg[200]; 
00342                         snprintf(msg, 199, "ERROR (qpOASES): Constraint matrix input dimension mismatch (%ld != %d)!", 
00343                                         (long int)mxGetN(prhs[A_idx]), nV);
00344                         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", msg);
00345                         mexErrMsgTxt(msg);
00346                 }
00347 
00348                 A_for = (real_t*) mxGetPr( prhs[ A_idx ] );
00349 
00350                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &lbA,nC,nP, BT_TRUE,prhs,lbA_idx ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00351                         return;
00352 
00353                 if ( smartDimensionCheck( &ubA,nC,nP, BT_TRUE,prhs,ubA_idx ) != SUCCESSFUL_RETURN )
00354                         return;
00355 
00356                 /* Check for sparsity. */
00357                 if ( mxIsSparse( prhs[ A_idx ] ) != 0 )
00358                 {
00359                         mwIndex *oct_ir = mxGetIr(prhs[A_idx]);
00360                         mwIndex *oct_jc = mxGetJc(prhs[A_idx]);
00361                         double *v = (double*)mxGetPr(prhs[A_idx]);
00362 
00363                         /* copy indices to avoid 64/32-bit integer confusion */
00364                         Air = new sparse_int_t[oct_jc[nV]];
00365                         Ajc = new sparse_int_t[nV+1];
00366                         for (long i = 0; i < oct_jc[nV]; i++) Air[i] = oct_ir[i];
00367                         for (long i = 0; i < nV + 1; i++) Ajc[i] = oct_jc[i];
00368 
00369                         /* copy values, too */
00370                         Av = new real_t[Ajc[nV]];
00371                         for (long i = 0; i < Ajc[nV]; i++) Av[i] = v[i];
00372 
00373                         A = new SparseMatrix(nC, nV, Air, Ajc, Av);
00374                 }
00375                 else
00376                 {
00377                         /* Convert constraint matrix A from FORTRAN to C style
00378                          * (not necessary for H as it should be symmetric!). */
00379                         A_mem = new real_t[nC*nV];
00380                         convertFortranToC( A_for,nV,nC, A_mem );
00381                         A = new DenseMatrix(nC, nV, nV, A_mem );
00382             A->doFreeMemory();
00383                 }
00384         }
00385 
00386         allocateOutputs( nlhs,plhs,nV,nC,nP );
00387 
00388         if ( nC == 0 )
00389         {
00390                 /* call qpOASES */
00391                 qpOASESmex_bounds(      nV,nP,
00392                                                         H,g,
00393                                                         lb,ub,
00394                                                         nWSRin,x0,&options,
00395                                                         nlhs,plhs
00396                                                         );
00397 
00398         delete H;
00399                 if (Hdiag) delete[] Hdiag;
00400                 if (Hv) delete[] Hv;
00401                 if (Hjc) delete[] Hjc;
00402                 if (Hir) delete[] Hir;
00403                 return;
00404                 /* 2) Call usual version including constraints (using QProblem class) */
00405         }
00406         else
00407         {
00408                 /* Call qpOASES. */
00409                 qpOASESmex_constraints( nV,nC,nP,
00410                                                                 H,g,A,
00411                                                                 lb,ub,lbA,ubA,
00412                                                                 nWSRin,x0,&options,
00413                                                                 nlhs,plhs
00414                                                                 );
00415 
00416                 delete A;
00417                 delete H; 
00418                 if (Av) delete[] Av;
00419                 if (Ajc) delete[] Ajc;
00420                 if (Air) delete[] Air;
00421                 if (Hdiag) delete[] Hdiag;
00422                 if (Hv) delete[] Hv;
00423                 if (Hjc) delete[] Hjc;
00424                 if (Hir) delete[] Hir;
00425                 return;
00426         }
00427 }
